about_the_game:
Ducking Grenades is an unconventional 2D side-scrolling action game in which grenades serve to traverse through the different levels, removing obstacles, defeating enemies that stand in your way and accomplish your goals!

Story

Play as General Ducky, who used to be a human mercenary, taking on dangerous missions with his crew - always fulfilling his missions and returning successfully. However, on his last mission, General Ducky was exposed to a new weapon technology which rapidly disintegrates the human body. General Ducky's crew acted quickly in transferring his consciousness into an artificial body in order to save him. Uncertain if this operation was successful, the crew disbanded and left their leader in a safe place to recover.

General Ducky's new body is not compatible with traditional arms and legs, therefore it is equipped with a remote-controlled, rotating mechanical arm which can spawn grenades, providing the main impulse for its movement. It can also fire a rechargeable boost to accelerate, decelerate and tweak the trajectory as needed!

It is now up to YOU to reassemble your crew and chase down the evil General Goosey and his minions to bring peace to the universe and destroy this dangerous new weapon technology!

Features

  • 2D side-scrolling action!
  • Unconventional, fast-paced movement by means of impulse!
  • Hand-made pixel art!
  • Six main levels with their own theme and epic boss fights, as well as several additional missions!
  • Optional challenges for each level in which you can put your abilities to the test!
  • Unlockable body upgrades and extra abilities for a game feel that suits you best!
  • Lots of unique enemy types that are added to your investigation journal on defeat!
  • Possibility to save all of General Ducky's crew members for additional features!
  • Dialogues with an original, unique duck-like voice - unmodified and no filters added!
  • An entirely different, innovative gaming experience!

Use your grenades to traverse in the most epic way possible ...


... and to fight any enemies that dare oppose you!


Are you ready to experience a unique game, action packed gameplay and a lot of fun?! Then you are looking in the right place!

name: Ducking Grenades

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: Ducking Grenades is a physics based game in which General Ducky traverses the world in a very unconventional way: With grenades! Hunt down the evil General Goosey and his minions and bring peace to the universe in this hand-made, fast-paced 2D side-scrolling action game!
